Usage

Q: How can I select a warlord?
A: All warlords\' name starts with \"The\", e.g. "The Black Brute", "The Golden Lance", etc.

Q: What is the simulation mode?
A: The simulation mode allows you to simulate a large number of battles between brigades of your choice. It\'s useful for brigade strength analysis.

General

Q: I like this app!
A: I\'m glad to hear it. Please rate it on the Play Store :)

Q: This app sucks!/I found a bug/This is not useful/I have a suggestion...
A: For bug report or feature request, please go to https://github.com/chinhodado/Blood-Brothers-PvP-Simulator
You can also drop me a line at chinho.dev@gmail.com and let me know how I can improve it. Thank you :)
